long_description: This 1-person Lifeline Disaster kit is stocked with essential supplies such as food, water and survival tools to help you get through 48 hrs. following a major emergency. All items are packed into a rugged carry bag, making the kit easy to take along on your travels. Nutrition items include 1 emergency food bar and 8 drinking water pouches. Survival tools include the sturdy carry bag, an emergency poncho, emergency blanket, hand warmers, glow stick, whistle and a "Call 911" flag. Lifeline Disaster kit also includes a dust mask, waterproof matches and a manual can opener.
short_description: This 1-person Lifeline Disaster kit is stocked with essential supplies such as food, water and survival tools to help you get through 48 hrs. following a major emergency.
